content: My name is Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was negotiating the rental price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Magdeburg.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If we had agreed on a final price, the exact number would be provided here. However, since we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide you with an exact number.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as a 5.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: If I had felt discriminated or offended, it would have been because of a specific action or comment made during the negotiation. Since I did not feel this way, I have no reason to provide a specific explanation.
name: Haoyu Wang
